events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago and it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info shows no updates for days.
The case has been categorized under Delivery Delay after reviewing the customer's complaint about shipping status.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle this delivery delay case for the customer.
